about.name: Konster
about.desc: Konster is a platform connecting users with contractors and suppliers, providing reliable and efficient service management solutions.

projectTeam.desc: The team consisted of two UI designers and one UX designer along with the project owner. The entire project was completed in 4 weeks.
members: Project Management and UX Design - Vanshita

desc: The current design of the application was too formal and complex.
The usage of brand colors was not balanced, with increased use of the primary color blue.
The icons and real-life images made the application less approachable and user-friendly, misaligning with the brand's principles of trust and transparency.

goals.title: User Goal
goals.desc: Redesign the entire user interface according to the given user flow and provide Konster with a fresh, clean, and minimal user interface.

desc: To make the app look minimal and simple, the use of blue was reduced by balancing the colors with a 60-30-10 rule: 60% white, 30% blue, and 10% yellow.
Illustrations and simplified icons were used to make the platform look more friendly and approachable.

discoveryPhase.identification: Understanding design challenges through consultations and competitor analysis.
discoveryPhase.validation: Incorporating user feedback to create a streamlined design approach.
discoveryPhase.analysis: Analyzed successful interfaces like ANGI, Task Rabbit, and Urban Company to draw inspiration.

insights.UI: Inspired by ANG, Task Rabbit, and Urban Company to design a simpler and more user-friendly interface for Konster.
insights.UX: Studied service booking processes to understand the user journey from finding a service to booking it, improving the booking experience on Konster.

ui.approach: Streamlined the color scheme, simplified icons, and improved the booking flow to create a simpler, minimalist, and more user-friendly UI for Konster.
ui.futureScope: Currently in the MVP stage, with plans for funding and application development.

achievements: Redesigned the entire Konster app with a fresh outlook of minimalist and simpler user interface.
